install.sql: CREATE TABLE `{prefix}news` ( `id` mediumint(7) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `member_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `lang` char(2) NOT NULL, `status` enum('inactive', 'active') NOT NULL default 'active', `date` datetime NOT NULL, `alias` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `body` text NOT NULL, `image` tinytext NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `LANGUAGE` (`lang`), FULLTEXT KEY `SEARCH` (`title`, `body`) ) {mysql_version};
